attributes.action: Deport all foreign and dual nationals convicted of any crime in the UK
attributes.additional_details: This must be done as a matter of course as we believe to live in the UK is a privilege, not a right and if you are a foreign or dual national and commit a crime in this country, you should lose the privilege to live in the UK.
attributes.background: All foreign and dual nationals committing any crimes in the UK must be deported at the end of any sentence or fine. For dual nationals this would mean removing their citizenship also.
